description: A Devil Fruit that grants the consumer's body the properties of rubber, making them a Rubber Human. The user becomes highly resistant to blunt attacks and electricity, and can stretch their body to great lengths.

abilities.description: The user's entire body becomes rubber, allowing them to stretch, bounce, and resist blunt force.

currentUser.consumptionCircumstances: Young Luffy accidentally ate the fruit while it was in Shanks' possession at Partys Bar in Foosha Village.

weaknesses.description: Like all Devil Fruit users, the consumer loses the ability to swim and becomes powerless in water.

weaknesses.weakness: Vulnerable to cutting and piercing attacks
weaknesses.description: While immune to blunt force, the rubber body can still be cut or pierced.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Eats the Gomu Gomu no Mi
keyMoments.description: The flashback reveals how young Luffy accidentally ate the Devil Fruit that was in Shanks' possession.
keyMoments.significance: Explains the origin of Luffy's powers and establishes that Shanks had acquired this fruit before Luffy ate it.

reveals.information: The fruit was in Shanks' possession before Luffy ate it
Luffy ate the fruit accidentally at age 7
